	available_if_capitulated = no

			limit = {
			has_idea = POL_a_capable_army
			}

		}

			limit = {
			OR = {
			NOT = { has_idea = POL_grand_army_of_europe }
			NOT = { has_idea = POL_a_capable_army }
			}
			}
			add_ideas = POL_a_capable_army
		}
	}

			NOT = { country_exists = UKR }
		}
	}

	continue_if_invalid = no
	available_if_capitulated = no

shared_focus = {
	id = POL_army_cheaper_artillery
	icon = artillery3
	x = -3
	y = 1
	relative_position_id = POL_army_improved_rifles
	cost = 5

	ai_will_do = {
		factor = 10
	}

	prerequisite = {
		focus = POL_army_improved_rifles
	}

	available = {

	}

	bypass = {

	}

	cancel_if_invalid = yes
	continue_if_invalid = no
	available_if_capitulated = no

	completion_reward = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = POL_increased_production
						has_idea = POL_increased_production_3
					}
				}
			}
			add_ideas = POL_increased_production_2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = POL_increased_production
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = POL_increased_production
				add_idea = POL_increased_production_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = POL_increased_production_3
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = POL_increased_production_3
				add_idea = POL_increased_production_4
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

					infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }

					infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }

					infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }

					infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }

				}
				support = {
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_full_control_of_state = PREV } }
				prioritize = { 12 }
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Militia 1\" division_template = \"Militia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
					owner = POL
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_full_control_of_state = PREV } }
				prioritize = { 12 }
				create_unit = {

				prioritize = { 12 }
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Militia 3\" division_template = \"Militia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"

			}

	id = POL_economy_develop_the_industry
	icon = POL_generic_industrial_development
	x = 4
	y = 0

	cost = 5

	ai_will_do = {
		factor = 10
	}

	allow_branch = {
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = POL_dengism_revival_path
				has_global_flag = POL_prl_revival_path
				has_global_flag = POL_maoist_revival_path
				has_global_flag = POL_trotskism_revival_path
				has_global_flag = POL_jaruzelski_path
			}
		}
	}

	available = {

	}

	bypass = {

	}

	cancel_if_invalid = yes
	continue_if_invalid = no
	available_if_capitulated = no

	completion_reward = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = POL_the_outskirts_of_western_world
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = POL_the_outskirts_of_western_world
				add_idea = POL_the_outskirts_of_western_world_3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = POL_the_outskirts_of_western_world_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = POL_the_outskirts_of_western_world_2
				add_idea = POL_the_outskirts_of_western_world_3
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		POL_increase_national_debt = yes
	}
}

shared_focus = {
	id = POL_krakow_university_economics
	icon = POL_economic_university
	x = 0
	y = 1
	relative_position_id = POL_economy_zut

	cost = 5

	prerequisite = {
		focus = POL_economy_zut
	}

	ai_will_do = {
		factor = 10
	}

	available = {

	}

	bypass = {

	}

	cancel_if_invalid = yes
	continue_if_invalid = no
	available_if_capitulated = no

	completion_reward = {
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = industry_bonus
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = industry
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = POL_modern_education_idea
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = POL_modern_education_idea
				add_idea = POL_modern_education_idea_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = POL_modern_education_idea_4
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = POL_modern_education_idea_4
				add_idea = POL_modern_education_idea_3
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

	}

		hidden_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Monarchist Sympathisers"
				priority = 2
				regiments = {
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }

					infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }

					infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
					mot_artillery_brigade = { x = 2 y = 1 }
					mot_artillery_brigade = { x = 2 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					recon = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_full_control_of_state = PREV } }
				prioritize = { 69 }
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Monarchist Sympathisers\" division_template = \"Monarchist Sympathisers\" start_experience_factor = 1.0"
					owner = POL
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_full_control_of_state = PREV } }
				prioritize = { 69 }
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Monarchist Sympathisers\" division_template = \"Monarchist Sympathisers\" start_experience_factor = 1.0"
					owner = POL
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_full_control_of_state = PREV } }
				prioritize = { 69 }
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Monarchist Sympathisers\" division_template = \"Monarchist Sympathisers\" start_experience_factor = 1.0"
					owner = POL
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

shared_focus = {
	id = POL_monarchist_retake_her_majestys_throne
	icon = russian_monarchy2
	x = -2
	y = 1
	relative_position_id = POL_monarchist_invite_russian_monarchist_sympathisers

	cost = 5

	ai_will_do = {
		factor = 10
	}

	prerequisite = {
		focus = POL_monarchist_a_way_to_russia
	}

	prerequisite = {
		focus = POL_monarchist_encourage_patriotism
	}

	prerequisite = {
		focus = POL_monarchist_invite_russian_monarchist_sympathisers
	}

	available = {
		is_subject = no
		NOT = {
			country_exists = UKR
			country_exists = BLR
		}
	}

	bypass = {
		NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
		NOT = { country_exists = RCO }
	}

	cancel_if_invalid = yes
	continue_if_invalid = no
	available_if_capitulated = no

	will_lead_to_war_with = SOV
	will_lead_to_war_with = RCO
	completion_reward = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RCO
			}
			create_wargoal = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = RCO
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = SOV
			}
			create_wargoal = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = SOV
			}
		}
	}
}

			LAT = { transfer_state = 971 }

	cost = 5

		factor = 10
	}

		focus = POL_monarchist_control_over_austria

		has_completed_focus = POL_monarchist_our_sphere
		is_subject = no
	}

		NOT = { country_exists = FRA }
		NOT = { country_exists = BEL }
		NOT = { country_exists = LUX }
	}

			type = puppet_wargoal_focus

	bypass = {

	}

	continue_if_invalid = no
	available_if_capitulated = no

		if = {
			limit = {

			}
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		set_rule = { can_create_factions = yes }
		create_faction = POL_falangist_international
	}
}

shared_focus = {
	id = POL_falangist_a_new_leader
	icon = fascism2
	x = -4
	y = 1
	relative_position_id = POL_falangist_reach_out_to_foreign_fascists

	cost = 5

	ai_will_do = {
		factor = 10
	}

	prerequisite = {
		focus = POL_falangist_weaken_onrs_grip
		focus = POL_falangist_a_mourn_to_1939
	}

	prerequisite = {
		focus = POL_falangist_reach_out_to_foreign_fascists
	}

	available = {
		is_subject = no
		has_government = fascist
		OR = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				check_variable = { POL_NOP_influence > POL_ONR_influence }
				tooltip = POL_nop_more_popular_tt
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				check_variable = { POL_ONR_influence > POL_NOP_influence }
				tooltip = POL_onr_more_popular_tt
			}
		}
	}

	bypass = {

	}

	cancel_if_invalid = yes
	continue_if_invalid = no
	available_if_capitulated = no

	completion_reward = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = POL_focus_depends_on_previous_choices
		custom_effect_tooltip = POL_falangist_power_secured_tt
		clr_country_flag = POL_support_onr_flag
		clr_country_flag = POL_support_now_flag
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					check_variable = { POL_NOP_influence > POL_ONR_influence }
					tooltip = POL_nop_more_popular_tt
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = POL_went_nop_path
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {

				}

		}
	}

			value = -10

			value = -0.1

			}

		}

	}
